ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Have you ever gone anywhere or seen anyone for a reason that was related in anyway to your drinking: a physician, counselor, Alcoholics Anonymous, or any other community agency or professional ?
In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Alcoholics Anonymous, Narcotics or Cocaine Anonymous meeting, or any 12-step meeting?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Family services or other social services agency?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Alcohol or drug detoxification ward or clinic?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Inpatient ward of a Psychiatric or general hospital or community mental health program?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Outpatient clinic, including outreach programs and day or partial patient programs?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Alcohol or drug rehabilitation program?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Emergency room for any reason relating to your drinking?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Halfway house, including therapeutic communities?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Crisis center for any reason relating to your drinking?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Employee assistance program (EAP)?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Clergyman, priest, rabbi or any other religious counselor for any reason relating to your drinking?
Notes: 0 = Not applicable; 1 = Last 12 months only; 2 = Before the last 12 months only; 3 = Both time periods; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Private physician, psychiatrist, psychologist, social worker, or any other professional?

ElementDescription: In your entire life did you ever go to (a/an) ...Any other agency or professional?

ElementDescription: Was there ever a time when you thought you should see a doctor, counselor, or other health professional or seek any other help for your drinking, but you didn't go?
Did this happen during the last 12 months?
What were your reasons for not getting help? Wanted to go, but health insurance didn't cover
What were your reasons for not getting help? Didn't think anyone could help
What were your reasons for not getting help? Didn't know any place to go for help
What were your reasons for not getting help? Couldn't afford to pay the bill
What were your reasons for not getting help? Didn't have any way to get there
What were your reasons for not getting help? Didn't have time
What were your reasons for not getting help? Thought the problem would get better by itself
What were your reasons for not getting help? Was too embarrassed to discuss it with anyone
What were your reasons for not getting help? Was afraid of what my boss, friends, family, or others would think
What were your reasons for not getting help? Thought it was something I should be strong enough to handle alone
What were your reasons for not getting help? Was afraid they would put me into the hospital
What were your reasons for not getting help? Was afraid of the treatment they would give me
What were your reasons for not getting help? Hated answering personal questions
What were your reasons for not getting help? The hours were inconvenient
What were your reasons for not getting help? A member of my family objected
What were your reasons for not getting help? My family thought I should go but I didn't think it was necessary
What were your reasons for not getting help? Can't speak English very well
What were your reasons for not getting help? Was afraid I would lose my job
What were your reasons for not getting help? Couldn't arrange for child care
What were your reasons for not getting help? Had to wait too long to get into a program
What were your reasons for not getting help? Wanted to keep drinking or got drunk
What were your reasons for not getting help? Didn't think drinking problem was serious enough
What were your reasons for not getting help? Didn't want to go
What were your reasons for not getting help? Stopped drinking on my own
What were your reasons for not getting help? Friends or family helped me stop drinking
What were your reasons for not getting help? Tried getting help before and it didn't work
What were your reasons for not getting help? Was afraid my children would be taken away
What were your reasons for not getting help? My religious beliefs don't allow me to go for treatment
What were your reasons for not getting help? Other reason
What were your reasons for not getting help? Missing
